titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Berthold Richard Albin Biography circa 1959
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Jodi Allison-Bunnell (1998)
titlestmt.sponsor: Funding for encoding this finding aid was provided through a grant awarded by the National Endowment for the Humanities.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Jodi Allison-Bunnell 2004

repository.corpname: University of Montana, Mansfield Library, Archives and Special Collections

did.abstract: Vada Keller Albin was married to Berthold Richard Albin. The collection consists of a single 22-page biographical sketch of Berthold Richard Albin compiled by Vada Keller Albin in approximately 1959.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Vada Keller Albin was born October 27, 1901. She married Billings, Montana, store owner Berthold Richard Albin in 1935. She died September 21, 1988 in Billings.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a single 22-page biographical sketch of Berthold Richard Albin compiled by Vada Keller Albin in approximately 1959. Contents include a family tree back to 1851 that shows his German roots; a typescript copy of Mr. Albin’s 1953 obituary from the Billings Gazette; and assorted Albin family information.

accessrestrict.p: Researchers must use collection in accordance with the policies of Archives and Special Collections, the Maureen and Mike Mansfield Library, and the University of Montana--Missoula.

userestrict.p: Researchers are responsible for using in accordance with 17 U.S.C. and any other applicable statutes. Copyright not transferred to the University of Montana.

prefercite.p: [Name of document or photograph number], Berthold Richard Albin Biography, Archives and Special Collections, The University of Montana—Missoula.

processinfo.p: Actions of original processors are unknown; the collection was originally numbered SC 1.The collection was re-described in 1998 and re-numbered as Mss 012. In 2004, the finding aid was encoded.
